entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
